editor.label: Application Server - IIS StopAppPool
editor.description: This procedure stops an IIS application pool.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server. If the procedure is run on the host itself, use 'localhost'. (Required)

formElement.label: Application pool name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the application pool to stop. (Required)
